metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45829 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HDF5 1.13.1-1 is affected by: segmentation fault, which causes a Denial ofService.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
paraview: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
